tagline: Card games with live DJ's every Sunday & Thursday
rules:
Welcome to the Card Game Conisseurs SMASHED instance

OUR CODE OF CONDUCT

1. Do not block or mute any official SMASHED staff members or our own.

2. 18+ Only.

3. Follow VRChat's TOS.

4. No discrimination, bullying or unnecessary drama.

5. Be civil, act your age.

6. No portals to any other club worlds.

7. Pace yourself. Don't drink until you drop!

8. Suspicious activity will not be tolerated.

9. Upper torsos may be exposed. Viewer discretion is advised.

Like what we do? Join the Discord!

https://discord.gg/NCEx9Baa9z
infoBoard: We like playing cards․ Late night cards every Thursday and Sunday unless we're doing colabs that week․ Strictly 18＋
